body: There's a sequel series coming for Night bound?

As expected of RAN-sensei. This  bad end doujinshi (Non-canon and what if) of the original manga is good. 

Can't wait for the official manga continuation through the  new sequel series, though I feel bad for those waiting for a chapter 2 of this doujinshi since it'll depend on the author if they want to continue it despite their busy schedule.
